summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 HYUNDAI GENESIS COUPE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT AN UNKNOWN SPEED, THE CONTACT CRASHED HEAD ON INTO A TREE.  THE AIR BAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY.  A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED.  THE CONTACT SUSTAINED FRACTURES TO THE STERNUM, A BRAIN HEMORRHAGE, AND WHIPLASH.  THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED AND THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 45,000.
